title: Ask HN: Why does “Hey Siri on my iPhone” activate Siri on my iPad?
text: I have multiple Apple devices with Siri enabled on all of them. But I don't know why we can't ask Siri on any specific device to activate itself. Whenever I say "Hey Siri", it activates on a random device. For example, at my Mac, it opens Siri on my iPhone which is farther away. It should be fairly easy to implement a feature that activates Siri on any specific device. Or am I missing something?
